name: AVAudio3DPoint
desc: A structure that represents a point in 3D space.

items.name: init(x: Float, y: Float, z: Float)
items.desc: Creates a 3D point using the x, y, and z coordinates you specify.

items.name: func AVAudioMake3DPoint(Float, Float, Float) -> AVAudio3DPoint
items.desc: Creates a 3D point using the x, y, and z coordinates you specify.

items.name: var x: Float
items.desc: The location on the x-axis, in meters.

items.name: var y: Float
items.desc: The location on the y-axis, in meters.

items.name: var z: Float
items.desc: The location on the z-axis, in meters.
